data.text:
Riley County, Kansas Area Newspapers Obituaries

1998-99 Record

===============================================================================================

NOTICE: In keeping with our policy of providing free information on the Internet, data may be used by non-commercial entities, as long as this message remains on all copied material. These electronic pages may NOT be reproduced in any format for profit or for presentation by other persons or organizations.

Persons or organizations desiring to use this material for purposes other than stated above must obtain the written consent of the file contributor.

This file was contributed for use in the Kansas AHGP Wabaunsee County by Chyrl Lawrence-Bulger

===============================================================================================

Below are obituaries that appeared in Riley County, Kansas newspapers relating to Wabaunsee Co., Residence who were either born in Wabaunsee or died in Wabaunsee county. The index of newspaper obituaries are from the Manhattan Mercury, Wamego Times, and Westmoreland Recorder, all near Riley County, Kansas.

Further information and copies of the obituaries may be obtained for a small fee from the Riley County Genealogical Society. Communicate by e-mail at info@rileycgs.com or write to Riley County Genealogical Society, 2005 Claflin Road, Manhattan, Kansas 66502. Make sure you copy the information exactly as it appears here when requesting your information.
